data.title: Connected Communities Referral Program
data.text:
Who is eligible to participate?

Qualifying employees of a multi-dwelling unit residential community or a multi-tenant business complex. Current Quantum Fiber employees and extended family members are not eligible to participate.

How do I enroll in the Connected Communities Referral Program?

Enroll online at refer.quantumfiber.com. You must agree to program terms and conditions to participate.

How do I make a referral through the Connected Communities Referral Program?

Referral instructions will be provided to you after enrollment, based on enrollment questions.

How can I track my referrals?

You can track your referrals on your customized dashboard after you log in.

When will I receive the reward?

The reward will be sent to you once you have a qualified referral under the program that closes as a sale. You can start making referrals through this program at any time after you enroll. If enrolled as an individual you will receive the reward on a reloadable rewards card. Award is mailed to the address on file.

Is the reward card a credit card?

The reward card is not a credit card, nor is it an extension of credit from Quantum Fiber. By using the card, you acknowledge that you agree to the cardholder agreement and program terms and conditions.

How do I use the reward card?

Value is added to the card twice a month (approximately the 1st and 15th of the month). Once this occurs, you can use the value virtually anywhere in the U.S.

How will the reward value be taxed?

At the end of the year, you will be mailed a 1099-MISC form for earning amounts valued at over $600.

How can I check the reward card balance?

Visit MyPrepaidCenter.com and enter the card number or call the number on the back of the card to use the automated system.

How do I report a lost or stolen card?

When you receive the card, you must record the customer service number on the back of the card and the card number itself and keep them in a safe place. Should the card become lost or stolen, you must contact customer service at the number listed on the back of your card or call 1–877–227–0956 immediately. You will need your card number when requesting a replacement card.
